title: subsection (1) of section 82 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 82(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 82(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (section 82(1)) (commencement) order 2023

title: subsection (1) of section 82 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which 
subsection (1) of section 82 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [666] 3
